Container.Name: PhotoPrism
Container.Overview:
PhotoPrism™ is a server-based application for browsing, organizing and sharing your personal photo collection. It makes use of the latest technologies to automatically tag and find pictures without getting in your way. Say goodbye to solutions that force you to upload your visual memories to the cloud.
Please also support the developer of this superior project through a PayPal donation or on Patreon.
Database lockups: If you got problems where the database lockes up you should switch to a mysql based database but you have to also setup a dedicated database for that, for example 'MariaDB' from Linuxserver.io - if you need help please visit the support thread of this container and/or the MariaDB thread.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please
Container.Description:
PhotoPrism™ is a server-based application for browsing, organizing and sharing your personal photo collection. It makes use of the latest technologies to automatically tag and find pictures without getting in your way. Say goodbye to solutions that force you to upload your visual memories to the cloud.
Please also support the developer of this superior project through a PayPal donation or on Patreon.
Database lockups: If you got problems where the database lockes up you should switch to a mysql based database but you have to also setup a dedicated database for that, for example 'MariaDB' from Linuxserver.io - if you need help please visit the support thread of this container and/or the MariaDB thread.

Config.Name: Data Dir
Config.Description: Storage PATH for generated files like cache and index (Keep cache, settings and database)

Config.Name: Storage Path
Config.Description: Path to your images and storage folder for your settings

Config.Name: Photo Import Folder
Config.Description: Only if you want to use the Import function of PhotoPrism (ATTENTION: Don't put the import folder in a subdirectory of the storage folder for your images!)

Config.Name: Offensive Uploads
Config.Description: Allow uploads that MAY be offensive (Valid options: 'true' or 'false')

Config.Name: Flag Offensive Photos
Config.Description: Flag photos as private that MAY be offensive (Valid options: 'true' or 'false')

Config.Name: Website Tile
Config.Description: Website Title

Config.Name: Website Caption
Config.Description: Website Caption

Config.Name: Website Description
Config.Description: Website Description

Config.Name: Website Author
Config.Description: Website Author

Config.Name: Initial Admin Password
Config.Description: Initial Admin Password - you can change the password on the settings page (If you don't want to use a password delete this entry and create another variable with the Key: 'PHOTOPRISM_PUBLIC' and the Value: 'true')

Config.Name: WebGUI Port
Config.Description: WebGUI Port

Config.Name: Photoprims Database Type
Config.Description: Choose if you want to use the builtin 'sqlite' database or a 'mysql' based database (If you got problems where the database lockes up you should switch to mysql but you have to also setup a dedicated database for that for example 'MariaDB' from Linuxserver.io)

Config.Name: MySQL Database Connection
Config.Description: Needs to be filled out if you are using a 'mysql' based databyse type (it has to be filled in exact this format: 'DBUSER:DBPASSWORD@tcp(DBIP:DBPORT)/photoprism?parseTime=true' all values in CAPS have to be replaced with your credentials and without quotes)

Config.Name: Settings Hidden
Config.Description: Users can not view or change settings (Valid options: 'true' or 'false')

Config.Name: On-Demand Rendering
Config.Description: Enable on-demand thumbnail rendering (high memory and cpu usage - Valid options: 'true' or 'false')

Config.Name: Tumbnail Size Limit
Config.Description: Pre-rendered thumbnail size limit (default 2048, min 720, max 7680)

Config.Name: On-demand Size Limit
Config.Description: On-demand rendering size limit (default 7680, min 720, max 7680)

Config.Name: Converted Image Size Limit
Config.Description: Size limit for converted image files in pixels (720-30000)

Config.Name: Thumbnail Quality
Config.Description: Set to 95 for high-quality thumbnails (requires more storage)

Config.Name: Darktable Presets
Config.Description: Use darktable presets (disables concurrent raw to jpeg conversion - Valid options: 'true' or 'false')

Config.Name: Resample Filter
Config.Description: Resample filter, best to worst: blackman, lanczos, cubic, linear

Config.Name: Enable Experimental Features
Config.Description: Enable experimental features (Valid options: 'true' or 'false')

Config.Name: UID
Config.Description: Container Variable: UID

Config.Name: GID
Config.Description: Container Variable: GID

Config.Name: Storage Path
Config.Description: Change only if you know what you are doing! (delete this value if you want to store your database and generated thumnails in the main directory)
